WeaponProperties.automatic: Automatic: This weapon can also be fired in automatic mode for 2x damage, but at disadvantage.
WeaponProperties.cloud: Cloud: This fills a near-radius area with choking toxic gas. Since vampires do not breathe, it has no effect except vision limitation.
WeaponProperties.concealed: Concealed: This type of weapon can be hidden under your clothes without being obvious to others.
WeaponProperties.concussion: Concussion: This disorients and confuses a target for 2d4 rounds. It will affect vampires.
WeaponProperties.flame: Flame: This ignites all close flammable materials. Double damage to supernatural creatures.
WeaponProperties.heavy: Heavy: This weapon is very heavy and takes a full round to set up before firing at a target.
WeaponProperties.scope: Scope: This type of weapon has a mounted scope and imposes disadvantage if used against targets within short distance.
WeaponProperties.splash: Splash: This causes an additional half-damage (round down) to everyone within near distance of the target.
WeaponProperties.subdual: Subdual: This type of weapon will knock a mortal unconscious at zero HP instead of triggering a death timer. They wake up in 3d6 rounds.
WeaponProperties.suppressing: Suppressing: This type of weapon always has a suppressive effect when it is fired at a target (no special action required).
WeaponProperties.twohanded: Two-Handed: This type of weapon can only be used with both hands and your full attention.
